meanings.sent1: The sky turned purplish as the sun set.
meanings.sent2: She picked out a purplish dress for the party.
meanings.sent3: The purplish flowers in the garden seemed to be blushing.
meanings.sent4: The purplish hues of the painting added a mysterious touch.
meanings.sent5: The purplish sunset painted the horizon in a dreamy light.

meanings.sent1: The purplish berries were ripe and ready to be picked.
meanings.sent2: Her hair had a purplish tint under the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The purplish grapes looked like tiny jewels in the vineyard.
meanings.sent4: The purplish clouds hinted at an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The purplish shadows cast by the trees created a magical atmosphere.
